========
Tutorial
========

This Page will have 3 tutorial videos showing different levels of modification you can do to a visualization. 

video 1
=======

| **No JavaScript**, **No Observable**
| The fist video will show how to use a visualization from the visualization library.

video 2
=======

| The second video will show how to create your own visualization not found in the visualization library.

video 3
=======
 
| The third video will show how to add elements such as filters to a visualization.
